name: authentication-event
description: Information about an authentication event, including the timestamp, peer device, client details, and decision.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The date and time when the authentication event occurred.

fields.name: peer
fields.description: Information about the peer device involved in the authentication.

fields.name: client
fields.description: Information about the client being authenticated.

fields.name: decision
fields.description: The authentication decision that was made.

fields.name: decision-details
fields.description: Additional details about the authentication decision.
